items.sentence: Tom usually takes a shower before eating breakfast.
Tom very often takes a nap for an hour after lunch.
Tom waited under the tree until it stopped raining.
Tom wanted to spend the rest of his life with Mary.
Tom is that man over there with a long white beard.
Tom is the one who needs to deal with this problem.
Tom is the only one in this group who owns a truck.
Is it true that Tom will go to Australia next year?
I think that what you\'re wearing is inappropriate.
Tom is smarter than any other student in our class.
Tom asked Mary what she had been doing all morning.
Tom and Mary sat there a long time without talking.
Tom and Mary spent three hours discussing the plan.
The movie was actually much better than I expected.
There are fifteen people here, counting the guests.
There are nine girls and three boys in the library.
It\'s supposed to rain every day for the next week.
It\'s unlikely Tom will know what needs to be done.
It\'s very unlikely that Tom acts that way at home.
I thought that Tom was going to Australia with you.
I find it much easier to speak French than English.
I found it difficult to get along with my neighbor.
I can\'t even remember what we were fighting about.
I can\'t relax for a second when the kids are home.
I can\'t remember how to say "thank you" in French.
I can\'t remember the last time I saw you so happy.
My parents were satisfied with my grades this year.
No matter where Tom goes, he has a good reputation.
Tom locked himself in his room and won\'t come out.
They aren\'t children any more, but not adults yet.
Tom could see he wasn\'t going to win the argument.
I didn\'t realize that Tom wouldn\'t be here today.
Tom couldn\'t figure out where the money came from.
Tom couldn\'t forgive Mary for killing his parents.
Tom couldn\'t make himself heard in the noisy club.
I couldn\'t have done anything without Tom\'s help.
I think Tom may be able to do that if you help him.
I think it would be a good idea for you to do that.
I think it would be really good for you to do that.
I think my girlfriend is better looking than yours.
Tom can\'t remember where he bought his pink socks.
You\'re the only one who hasn\'t done what I asked.
Tom said Mary wasn\'t planning on doing that alone.
Tom said he couldn\'t find what he was looking for.
Tom said he didn\'t have the permission to do that.
I think that you should give Tom your phone number.
I don\'t think Tom\'s jokes are particularly funny.
Can you recommend a good place to eat Mexican food?
After Tom ate a little food, his strength returned.
After a while, Tom started to believe his own lies.
